attributes.additional_details: I would like to raise awareness for the skin condition E.B, there is no where near enough funding for this condition and I believe that with more research and more public awareness a cure could be in the future, there should be more tests related to E.B during pregnancy, and a lot more training in the condition accross the NHS. As an E.B sufferer I feel that the doctors I deal with are far too unaware and confused when it comes to treating a patient with E.B
